sentence: You genuinely have the feeling the working atmosphere is a very good one and you get the feeling the whole team is really motivated and likes what they do
this is provided free by the hotel and we have never experienced this anywhere else
A simply 10 on 10 experience from start to finish at this lovely property surrounded by spectacular lagoon ocean views and well furnished
The experience began with warm welcomes at the airport followed by a luxury boat transfer complete with drinks fresh fruit cold face towels and a preview of what to come
Facilities excellent throughout wonderful calm ambience and nothing was too much trouble
The setting was idyllic everything that we had hoped for but the big bonus was the attentiveness of all the staff
A unique and memorable resort experience
Four Seasons meets Maldives culture unimaginable service experience hospitality and blown away expectations
We have stayed in some of the most exclusive resorts around the world and nothing comes close to the service experience at Four Seasons Kuda Hura

On arrival we greeted with some local music which was a nice touch overall arrival experience was great airport staffs were very helpful and attentive was expecting a room orientation on arrival which we did not get and had difficulty to open the door to the deck area
I had a previous terrible experience and Ronaldo was by my side the entire time making sure I was comfortable

Again I think this is telling a story about the cleanliness around the resort buildingsOveral a shame as we had all expected an exceptional experience but I think we were all shocked by this isueI hope someone higher up the Four Seasons chain reads this review and does something about the problem before they loose all their future businesVery disappointed
This is not exactly the atmosphere we found there is a bit of Ritz Paris lurking around that feeling of excessive care that makes you feel good but not exactly relaxed
Although we did not do the wild dolphin tour this time we highly recommend the experience

We have to mention the spa just getting there on small Maldivian boat is experience in itself once there my wife and I enjoyed a treatment together watching the fish through a window in floor show casing the delightedly of the ocean
I would have given this experience a higher rating except for one unpleasant action on the part of the management
As i did not have any prior experience I was advised to take the private lesson which costed the same as attending one of their scheduled group class
I was scared at first but the beers on board music and just the best vibes ever made me feel confident on the waves improving rapidly
Food at the restaurants albeit pricey was unique and wide in variety to make each dining experience quite memorable
Nothing anyone tells you about the Maldives prepares you for the sheer experience
I ca n’t think of a single need not met nor amenity that was n’t available and the memories we created will live in my heart forever
